thread.title: Thunder Hawks in section title game against Albany
thread.title_full: Thunder Hawks in section title game against Albany

author: Nick Vespasiano, Staff writer : nvespasiano@montenews.com : https://twitter.com/MontenewsNick
title: Thunder Hawks in section title game against Albany
text: Thunder Hawks in section title game against Albany With a close 20-14 win over the Holdingford Huskers on Tuesday night, the Montevideo Thunder Hawks are headed to the Section 6AAA finals against Albany this weekend. Montevideo’s record this season is now 9-1. Comment By Nick Vespasiano, Staff writer : nvespasiano@montenews.com : https://twitter.com/MontenewsNick Montevideo American-News By Nick Vespasiano, Staff writer : nvespasiano@montenews.com : https://twitter.com/MontenewsNick Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 8:00 AM By Nick Vespasiano, Staff writer : nvespasiano@montenews.com : https://twitter.com/MontenewsNick Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 8:00 AM Montevideo, MN With a close 20-14 win over the Holdingford Huskers on Tuesday night, the Montevideo Thunder Hawks are headed to the Section 6AAA finals against Albany this weekend. Montevideo’s record this season is now 9-1. Montevideo scored the game’s first points late in the first quarter on a 21-yard touchdown pass from Troy Diggins to Bailey Eickhoff. Afumble recovery by Ethan Schmitt led to the score. A blocked punt by Connor Kontz put the ThunderHawks inside Holdingford’s 10-yard line and set up a touchdown pass from Diggins to Travis Dreyer. The extra point was missed and the Hawks were up 13-0. For more on this story and others pick up this weeks paper or subscribe today! By Nick Vespasiano, Staff writer : nvespasiano@montenews.com : https://twitter.com/MontenewsNick Montevideo American-News By Nick Vespasiano, Staff writer : nvespasiano@montenews.com : https://twitter.com/MontenewsNick Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 8:00 AM
